verses.roman:
muñi adhama tomāra nā pāba daraśana
kemate dhariba ei pāpiṣṭha jīvana

synonyms: muñi—I; adhama—the lowest of men; tomāra—Your; nā—not; pāba—will get; daraśana—seeing; kemate—how; dhariba—shall I maintain; ei—this; pāpiṣṭha—sinful; jīvana—life.
translation: "Because I am the lowest among men, I shall not be able to see You. How shall I maintain my sinful life?"
